body_html:
@zheng-xq / @caisq a gentle ping? If you care to check our downstream fork such as:
https://github.com/ROCmSoftwarePlatform/tensorflow-upstream/blob/develop-upstream/tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc

you can find most of existing logic in GPU common runtime are retained on both CUDA and ROCm path. We only need to condition between GOOGLE_CUDA for CUDA, and TENSORFLOW_USE_ROCM on ROCm for GPU platform-specific API calls.
